name: 9Dragons
description: 9Dragons is a free to play MMORPG with fluid martial arts combat, lush environments, and intense PvP. Immerse yourself in a mesmerizing world set in ancient China at the beginning of martial arts chivalry.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 3 1GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 2MX DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.0GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce FX 5900 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
